text: satyavisvasikale, oru janata marrearu janataye parihasikkarut. parihasikkappetunnavar parihasikkunnavarekkal nallavarayekkam. strikal strikaleyum parihasikkarut. parihasikkappetunnavar parihasikkunnavarekkal uttamakalayekkam. ninnalan'yean'yam kuttuvakku parayarut. parihasapperukalupayeagicc parasparam apamanikkarut. satyavisvasam svikariccasesam adharmattinre perupayeagikkunnat valare nicam tanne. ar pascattapikkunnillayea avar tanneyan akramikal
